.. _alg-enmapbox-extractspectralprofiles:

*******************************************
Extract spectral profiles from raster layer
*******************************************

..
  ## AUTOGENERATED TITLE END

..
  ## AUTOGENERATED DESCRIPTION START

..
  ## AUTOGENERATED DESCRIPTION END

..
  ## AUTOGENERATED PARAMETERS START

**Parameters**

:guilabel:`Input raster layer (spectral data)` [raster]

:guilabel:`Input vector layer (sample locations)` [vector]

**Outputs**

:guilabel:`Output vector layer with spectral profiles` [vectorDestination]

..
  ## AUTOGENERATED PARAMETERS END

..
  ## AUTOGENERATED COMMAND USAGE START

**Command-line usage**

``>qgis_process help enmapbox:extractspectralprofiles``::

    ----------------
    Arguments
    ----------------

    INPUT_RASTER: Input raster layer (spectral data)
        Argument type:    raster
        Acceptable values:
            - Path to a raster layer
    INPUT_VECTOR: Input vector layer (sample locations)
        Argument type:    vector
        Acceptable values:
            - Path to a vector layer
    OUTPUT: Output vector layer with spectral profiles
        Argument type:    vectorDestination
        Acceptable values:
            - Path for new vector layer

    ----------------
    Outputs
    ----------------

    OUTPUT: <outputVector>
        Output vector layer with spectral profiles

..
  ## AUTOGENERATED COMMAND USAGE END
